description:
GroupDocs.Viewer for .NET is a flexible library that enables you to display documents and images of more than 45 file formats from within your web & mobile applications. The library is 100% independent and doesn't require any 3rd-party software installation. This allows end users to, for example, view PDF documents from within your .NET applications without having to install Adobe Reader.

With GroupDocs' document viewer for .NET, your app's users can view documents and images of the following file formats:

 - Portable Document Format: PDF
 - Microsoft Word: DOC, DOCX, DOCM, DOT, DOTX, DOTM
 - Microsoft Excel: XLS, XLSX, XLSM, XLSB
 - Microsoft PowerPoint: PPT, PPTX, PPS, PPSX
 - Microsoft Visio: VSD, VDX, VSS, VSX, VST, VTX, VSDX, VDW
 - Microsoft Project: MPP, MPT
 - Microsoft Outlook: MSG, EML, EMLX
 - OpenDocument Formats: ODT, OTT, ODS, ODP
 - Rich Text Format: RTF
 - Plain Text File: TXT
 - Comma-Separated Values: CSV
 - HyperText Markup Language: HTML, MHT, MHTML
 - Extensible Markup Language: XML
 - XML Paper Specification: XPS
 - AutoCAD Drawing File Format: DXF, DWG (2004)
 - Image files: BMP, GIF, JPG, PNG, TIFF, multi-page TIFF
 - Electronic publication: EPUB
 - Windows Icon: ICO

Documents can be both rasterized and converted to SVG+HTML+CSS, delivering high-fidelity native text rendering.

GroupDocs.Viewer for .NET comes with a convenient UI, which allows users to easily navigate documents when viewing them. For instance, users can scroll multi-page documents, turn pages with the Go Forward/Backward buttons, jump straight to a specified page, search for text within the document using keywords, preview pages with thumbnails, zoom, print and download documents right from a web-browser.

For more details on the GroupDocs.Viewer for .NET Library, please visit our website: 
http://groupdocs.com/dot-net/document-viewer-library

Note: this download contains a fully working version of the product, however without a license set it will run in evaluation mode with some limitations. To test GroupDocs' document viewer for .NET library without evaluation limitations, request a free 30-day temporary license.
releaseNotes:
We are pleased to share a new version of GroupDocs.Viewer for .NET, with the following improvements

New Features
WEB-1716	Developing a new feature - caching of a PDF-version of a document
WEB-1735	Support multiple simultaneous instances of the GroupDocs.Viewer, which can have different root storage paths

Improvements
WEB-1733	Exception message is unclear and uninformative when root storage path is invalid or not found

Bugs Fixed
WEB-1762	RotationCounter throws exception in specific scenarios
WEB-1756	Incorrect behaviour of Viewer when trying to display non-existent file
WEB-1761	Method Viewer.StopService throws NullReferenceException when it was called before Viewer.StartService
WEB-1736	GroupDocs.Viewer is incompatible with the latest Aspose.Email version 5.3
WEB-1728	Incorrect formatting of the header of the email message
WEB-1725	"watermarkWidthInPercents" parameter is not working when its value has a fraction component
WEB-1672	PDF rendered without spaces in HTML mode
WEB-1710	With eml files the date is not right
WEB-1318	One Page in Row/Two Pages in Row/ Cover Then Two Pages in Row View Modes are not translated for localizations
WEB-1375	Spinner is displayed above the "Loading your content" text for itIT/ruRU localizations
WEB-1374	"Progress spinner" is displayed above "Loading your content..."text for SelfHostingDemo/CacheGenerationUpdatePanelSample projects
WEB-1757	Trial banner is not translated for localizations
WEB-1299	Trial banner/message are not translated for localizations
WEB-1041	Unlicensed notification is not fully displayed for html based engine after zooming in
WEB-1046	Extra symbols are displayed for particular HTM file
WEB-1053	Text of "View Mode" drop down value is not fully displayed for "Locale("ru-RU")" setting
WEB-1071	Issue with excel documents when switch between engines with "SupportTextSelection(false)"
WEB-1163	Tab of the sheet is overlapped on the document content for particular EXCEL file in trial mode
WEB-1196	Issue with ICO files display
WEB-1370	The content of TXT document is displayed not fully after rotation on 180 and 270 degrees with HTML-base engine
WEB-1564	HTML thumbnails are not centered when pages have different widths
WEB-1565	Error messages are shown in the second instance of Viewer
WEB-1713	controller method on init of the page is called 2 times
WEB-1720	txt and xlsx files doesn't view in the IE9
WEB-1724	JavaScript error in the browser console: "net::ERR_INVALID_URL" for empty image data URLs
WEB-1730	An "Unrecognized expression" error when switching between tabs of an Excel document with virtual scrolling
WEB-1731	Images are displaced on the first page of a PDF in IE10 on the HTML engine
WEB-1732	Characters are displaced on page 18 of a PowerPoint file in the HTML engine
WEB-1737	The loading spinner is shown after rotating a TXT document on 90 degrees on HTML-base engine and reopening
WEB-1743	Text is invisible in MSG files opened via the HTML engine
WEB-1751	The ".grpdx .html_page_contents" selector is put before an HTML comment in a CSS style when viewing an HTML
WEB-1752	500 Internal Server Error when a GIF resource is absent for an HTML file in HTML mode
WEB-1753	Two dots before a class ("..grpdx") in CSS generated when opening an HTML file
WEB-1754	".grpdx" before "@media" in CSS generated when opening an HTML file
WEB-1755	An Iframe is not shown when opening an HTML file
WEB-754		CMS content is compressed on devices
WEB-918		Notification that Viewer allows not more than 15 views per hour is too big in IE8 if set up ".UseHtmlBasedEngine(true)"
WEB-921		Issues with displaying page content if open file by url
WEB-933		User is unable to open/close "Thumbnails" in "Double Page Flip" mode if set up .UseInnerThumbnails(true)
WEB-973		Trial banner is displayed under Thumbs panel and under main content in IE 11
WEB-985		Error "Unable to get value of the property 'topLeft': object is null or undefined" occurs after double click on top left/right corner of page with "Double Page Flip" in IE
WEB-990		"SupportTextSelection(false)" option doesn't work with "UseHtmlBasedEngine(true)"
summary: GroupDocs.Viewer for .NET is a flexible library that enables you to display documents and images of more than 45 file formats from within your web and mobile applications. The library is 100% independent and doesn't require any 3rd-party software installation.
title: GroupDocs.Viewer for .NET
